pages.text: Legends tell of a mysterious mineral, $(bold)one which known to be about as common as redstone$(). It has been dubbed by many as "$(5)arcanum mineralis$()", or "$(italic)mysterious mineral$()" in Latin. It is told to $(bold)have mysterious properties which could be harnessed$(); the glowing crystal, $(bold)if used right, could be used to do nearly anything$().
For those with the magical $(6)Silk Touch$() enchantment, raw $(5)Arcanum Mineralis$() can be smelted in a regular furnace to create a crystal.
